This project provides real-time information on the nutritional status of humanitarian staff in Gaza. Our aim is to inform humanitarian decision-making, advocacy, and diplomatic action to improve the lives of the affected population. Find out more [about the project](./about).

## Get involved

We are actively seeking participants to support the project, and welcome new collaborations with humanitarian organisations. Find out more:

::: {.callout-info}
##### For organisations
- We are seeking collaborations with humanitarian organisations operating in Gaza. We have a lightweight, low cost process to enable ongoing data collection. Read more in the [study protocol](./protocol#data-collection-and-analysis), and please get in touch with the [project team](#get-in-touch).
:::

::: {.callout-info collapse="true"}
##### For participants
- We thank all participants providing their data. Participation is voluntary, and participants are welcome to join or leave the study at any time. Read more about [information for participants](./protocol#appendix-information-sheet-and-online-consent-statement).
:::
